title: Ty Cobbs -- Looking to Trade or Sell
author: Rhotchkiss

posts.post_title: Ty Cobbs -- Looking to Trade or Sell
posts.post_content:
Interested in trading for rare Cobb/Wagner items, super-rare T206s or Ruth/Jackson/Plank items, as well as T213, T214, T215 & T216

E102 Cobb, PSA 3: $12,400.00

1920 Holsum Bread, SGC 1: $10,500,00
This card is the super-tough "facing front" and is the only graded example on PSA/SGC population reports. Under-graded in my opinion, but can be choosy with 1 of 1s. 

T206 Cobb Bat Off, SGC 6: $10,500.00

You can also visit the cards in larger format here: [url]https://www.flickr.com/photos/156271...h/33167470218/[/url]
